EnhancedContent:
Skip to content The next evolution of **Windows 11** is here with **Copilot+ PCs**, bringing a new level of intelligence to your everyday computing. Powered by advanced **AI capabilities** and a **Neural Processing Unit (NPU)** capable of **40+ trillion operations per second (TOPS)**, these devices transform how you create, communicate, and stay productive.

While availability and functionality may vary by device, region, and configuration, here’s a closer look at some of the most exciting features that make **Copilot+ PCs with Windows 11** truly unique.

## Agent in Settings

A built-in **AI assistant** integrated directly into the Windows Settings app, **Agent in Settings** simplifies PC management. You can ask questions like “How do I extend my battery life?” or “Turn on dark mode,” and get instant, guided help. *Available now on Copilot+ PCs with Snapdragon® X Series processors; expanding to other devices in 2025.*

## Automatic Super Resolution

Gamers rejoice! **Automatic Super Resolution** boosts visual fidelity and frame rates in supported titles using AI-driven upscaling. It’s like getting a visual performance upgrade without new hardware. *Currently available on Copilot+ PCs with Snapdragon® X Series processors.*

## Click to Do

Turn ideas into actions with **Click to Do** — an AI feature that identifies actionable text or image elements. Whether it’s scheduling an appointment or translating an image, just click and let AI handle the rest. *Available features vary by region, device, and language.*

## Improved Windows Search

Finding content is now faster and more intuitive. **Enhanced Windows Search** uses AI to understand context, improving results for text, image, and document queries across multiple languages. *Optimized for English, Chinese (Simplified), French, German, Japanese, and Spanish.*

## Live Captions with Translation

**Live Captions** now go global — translating subtitles from **40+ languages into English** and **27 into Simplified Chinese** in real time. Perfect for accessibility and cross-language communication during meetings or media playback.

## Paint: Reimagined with AI

The classic Paint app gets a powerful AI upgrade with several new features exclusive to Copilot+ PCs:

- **Cocreator** – Generate artwork from text prompts.
- **Generative Fill** – Add or remove objects seamlessly.
- **Object Select** – Isolate and edit subjects instantly.
- **Sticker Generator** – Create custom stickers from your ideas.

All these features leverage Microsoft’s responsible AI cloud services and are optimized for English text prompts.

## Photos: AI-Enhanced Creativity

Transform your photos with smart editing tools that were once only possible in pro-level software:

- **Image Creator** – Generate visuals from text prompts.
- **Relight** – Adjust lighting after a photo is taken.
- **Restyle Image** – Apply artistic filters guided by AI.
- **Super Resolution** – Sharpen details for stunning clarity.
*Initially available on Snapdragon® X Series devices, rolling out to others mid-2025.*

## Recall (Preview)

**Recall** is your AI-powered memory, letting you instantly locate past activities, apps, and content — as if your PC remembers everything for you. Requires **Windows Hello Enhanced Sign-in Security** and is optimized for select languages. Enterprise controls are available for managed environments.

## Snipping Tool: Perfect Screenshot

Capture exactly what you need with AI-enhanced cropping, object recognition, and automatic cleanup. It’s the screenshot tool, perfected. *Exclusive to Copilot+ PCs.*

## Voice Access with Flexible Commands

Voice control on Windows has never been this natural. **Flexible Commands** let you navigate, dictate, and edit hands-free in multiple languages — ideal for accessibility or multitasking. *Currently available on Snapdragon® X Series devices.*

## Windows Studio Effects

Make your video calls shine with **Windows Studio Effects**, using the NPU to deliver advanced background blur, eye contact correction, and lighting enhancements — all in real time.

## The Future Is Here

Copilot+ PCs mark a major leap forward for Windows users, combining **local AI performance** with **cloud intelligence** for seamless productivity, creativity, and communication.

Whether you’re editing photos, managing workflows, or just enjoying a more intuitive PC experience, Copilot+ is designed to make technology feel more human — and more helpful.
